description:
After selling resort homes on the moon, the Keroro Platoon decides to get around to actually building them.  Natsumi and Fuyuki volunteer to go with them on a moon vacation, too!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro Shoutai Watashi o Tsuki e Tsuretette de Arimasu
ケロロ小隊 私を月へ連れてって であります
